ARABIC: إِنَّكُمْ وَمَا تَعْبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ حَصَبُ جَهَنَّمَ أَنتُمْ لَهَا وَٰرِدُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: You and what you worship besides Allah are fuel for Hell. You will go down into it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Verily you and those you worship other than God will be faggots for Hell; and come to it you will.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: (They will be told): "Verily you and the gods you worshipped beside Allah are the fuel of Hell. All of you are bound to arrive there.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They will be told, "You and what you had worshipped instead of God will be the fuel of hell".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “Indeed you* and all that you worship** besides Allah, are the fuel of hell; in it you must go.” (* All disbelievers ** Idols and disbelievers who claimed to be Gods. The Prophets like Eisa and Uzair who were worshipped are exempt from this, and so are Maryam, and trees and the moon etc.)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Certainly you and that which you are worshipping now besides Allah, are (but) fuel (Hasab) for Hell! (Surely) you will enter it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Surely you and what you worship besides Allah are the firewood of hell; to it you shall come.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Surely you, and that you were serving apart from God, are fuel for Gehenna; you shall go down to it.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! ye (idolaters) and that which ye worship beside Allah are fuel of hell. Thereunto ye will come.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: You and what you worship instead of God will be fuel for hell: to it you shall all come --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily ye and whatsoever ye worship beside Allah shall be firewood for Hell: thereunto ye shall go down.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed you and what [idols] you worship besides Allah shall be fuel for hell, and you will enter it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Verily ye, (unbelievers), and the (false) gods that ye worship besides Allah, are (but) fuel for Hell! to it will ye (surely) come!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Certainly! You (disbelievers) and that which you are worshipping now besides Allah, are (but) fuel for Hell! (Surely), you will enter it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: You and all those who you were worshipping, other than Allah, shall be the fuel of Gehenna; there you shall all go down to it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: You and what you worship besides God are fuel for Hell. You will descend into it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, you [disbelievers] and what you worship other than Allah are the firewood of Hell. You will be coming to [enter] it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [21:98] ‘Truly you, O people of Mecca, and what you worship besides God, that is, other than Him, in the way of graven images, shall be fuel for Hell, [you shall be] its fodder; and you shall come to it’, [you shall] enter it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Lo! ye) people of Mecca (and that which ye worship beside Allah) of idols (are fuel of hell. Thereunto ye) people of Mecca, and your idols, (will come) i.e. Gehenna.
